attributes.action: CCTV for all SEN schools for parents to access to get a true picture
attributes.additional_details: I want and believe that on both parties ‘school staff and parents are provided with the access to cctv to see the day to day challenges and progress both pupils and staff attained. This will prevent in any future harm and abuse for all, children need to be restrained for safety but with cctv this can be monitored correctly and avoid further upset and most importantly any abuse than can be avoided
attributes.background: Thank you for given the time to read the following... I am a parent with a child with challenging behaviour and extreme anxiety and spd, My son is a 6 year old smart, caring,intelligent, funny little boy with the world ahead off him, and I know he will achieve amazing things in life
